content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. a) Identify ONE claim made in the passage. b) Identify ONE way in which the ideas expressed in the passage illustrate the social or political development of China under the Song dynasty.

topic.text: 1.1: Developments in East Asia from c. 1200 to c. 1450

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
